ATTENTION: DOCTORS WHO PROVIDE OR WANT TO LEARN “HOW TO” PROVIDE SPINAL DECOMPRESSION, NEUROPATHY & KNEE CARE $$$ CASH PROGRAMS AND DOMINATE YOUR MARKETS!!!

*SPECIAL VIDEO: CLICK Below To Watch

THE CHIRO EVENT: ATLANTA - SATURDAY, OCTOBER 5TH - 5 STAR

To Reserve Your Seat Call: 888-990-9660

THE CHIRO EVENT: ATLANTA - SATURDAY, OCTOBER 5TH - 5 STAR

To Reserve Your Seat Call: 888-990-9660

I’ve Been a Chiropractor For 38 Years. If You Would Have Told Me That What I Am About To Share With You Was Ever Possible, I Would Have Said “Wake ME Up, I Must Be Dreaming”

For a majority of my years as a Chiropractor, everything was about P.V.A. Which was “PATIENT VISIT AVERAGE”. As the years progressed, I discovered a NEW REALITY. That P.V.A. is really about “PATIENT VALUE AVERAGE”. Meaning, the typical amount collected from our office per patient is OVER $5000. The BEST part is it is 100% CASH, (Yes, ZERO Insurance Needed, nor Accepted).

As a “SPECIALIZED CHIROPRACTOR” we are doing it with SPINAL DECOMPRESSION. We are “DISC-SPECIFIC and DISC-CENTRIC” Chiropractors who are closing cases that are PREE-PAID and although our average case is $5000+,YES many  are even higher. As CHIROPRACTORS we often  are PRESENTING and  CLOSING 4+ PLUS cases per day. Now I was never great in math, but I know that 4 Cases MULTIPLIED by $5000 per case is
TWENTY THOUSAND DOLLARS CASH in a SINGLE DAY!!!

Yes, we have a system. Yes, we have protocols. Yes, we have marketing and YES, WE TEACH THE EXACT SYSTEM.
Tony Robbins has said “SUCCESS is EASY”. Simply find someone that is getting the RESULTS that you want and MIRROR, MATCH & MODEL “Exactly” what they do

Well, what if I told you that there is a ONE-DAY training that shows you
“EXACTLY” how so many $5000+ Patient VALUE Average CHIROPRACTORS are DOING IT.

This “BEHIND-THE-SCENES” look inside is presented by Dr. Eric Kaplan and Dr. Perry Bard. Yes, the SAME two doctors, entrepreneurs, brand specialists and DISC-SPECIALIZED Chiropractors who have a combined 75 YEARS+ as Chiropractors and together OWN the LARGEST AMOUNT of Physical Real Estate and INTERNET Real Estate under the LARGEST BRAND of NON-SURGICAL SPINAL DECOMPRESSION Centers in the world known as “DISC Centers of America”.

DISCOVER a powerful method for NEW PATIENT production from 7 of the most reliable yet unknown sources. MASTER how to communicate Chiropractic effectively 60 seconds & guaranteed to INCREASE your production.

LEARN to motivate, excite and empower your staff with 3 NEW proven-to-work techniques. UNCOVER the real “INNER Secrets” of SOCIAL media and CAPITALIZE on new “Portals of Entry”.  5 NEW ways to create a “WOW Factor” designed to create raving fans who now will refer others. ENJOY an AMAZING Gourmet Working Lunch designed for networking and reviewing all of the material. DISCOVER 3 powerful tools the TOP 1% of clinics have utilized for EXTREME profitability. SEE the BEST NEW plug and play secrets, systems, tools, and strategies created by and shared from Dr. Eric Kaplan and Dr. Perry Bard “LIVE”

Learn FROM the SOURCE. No contracts, no obligation, no pressure, nothing to sign. Just 1 SINGLE day to LEARN and DISCOVER how you too can take all the materials shared that day, (YES, more CONTENT than you can believe) and apply your NEW-FOUND KNOWLEDGE back in your practice on Monday morning.

Seats are extremely limited, and it will be SOLD OUT. Your training is 100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED and you will DISCOVER EXACTLY how CREATING a $5000 P.V.A. is simply a matter of knowledge.

The ATLANTA CHIRO EVENT ***SATURDAY, OCTOBER 5th, 2024
CALL Toll Free 888-990-9660 to secure your RESERVED SEAT today!!!

1.-Do You PRESENTLY Have a Spinal Decompression Table?

2.-Do You PROVIDE Spinal Decompression CASH Programs?

3.-Do You Convert CHIROPRACTIC Cases to Spinal Decompression?

4.-Do You PACKAGE Spinal Decompression with Therapies?

5.-Does Your TEAM Know HOW-TO Educate Decompression Patients?

6.-Do You Utilize the LATEST Spinal Decompression Research?

7.-Do You Know HOW-TO Use Decompression Social Media?

8.-Do You Know HOW-TO Utilize The Medical Radiology M.R.I. Report?

9.-Do You Know HOW-TO Use The Right Decompression Visual Models?

10.-Do You Know HOW-TO Keep Your Decompression FULL?

*URGENT Notice For ALL DECOMPRESSION DOCTORS

A LIVE Training For Doctors with the Following Tables:

-Accu Spina -DRX -VAX-D -Hill DOC -SpineMed
-KDT -Triton DTS & MORE!!!
